name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eru Chitanda Hyouka: Charming Live Wallpaper for Chrome!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the captivating charm of Eru Chitanda from *Hyouka* to your browser with this stunning live wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This beautifully crafted live wallpaper features Eru Chitanda in her iconic, curious pose, surrounded by vibrant colors and intricate details. As she brings her signature energy and curiosity to your screen, the scene evolves with subtle animations, offering a delightful touch of *Hyouka*'s atmosphere to your Chrome browser. Perfect for fans of the anime or anyone who loves captivating visuals.

Along with the eye-catching animation, popular site shortcuts for easy access, and a real-time date and time display. Enhance your browsing experience with a unique and personal touch. Download now and let Eru Chitanda add a touch of charm to your browser!
